subject: Soccer
Gambling
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: The convicted murderer, an illegal immigrant named Guang Hui Cao, refuses to this day to give a motive for his crime. But detectives unearthed evidence that the victims were both involved with an Asian gambling ring.
snippet: The convicted murderer, an illegal immigrant named Guang Hui Cao, refuses to this day to give a motive for his crime. But detectives unearthed evidence that the victims were both involved with an Asian gambling ring.
